decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its scale, massing, bulk and design, would result in an over-dominate and unsympathetic form of development, to the detriment of the host property and surrounding area. It would fail to preserve the character and appearance of the Ealing Green Conservation Area. As such, the proposal would be contrary to Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of the Ealing Local Plan (2024) (Reg 19).

| The proposed development, by reason of its scale, massing, bulk and design, would result in a loss of light, outlook and reduce the sense of privacy to neighbouring properties, to the detriment of their amenities. As such, the proposal is contrary Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Alteration to existing roof involving raising its height and construction of crown roof, installation of 8 roof lights to front, rear and side roof slopes and a dormer window on the rear slope; raising height of the front and rear walls; replace two existing long windows at front and provide two separate bay windows and three windows on the first floor to match the adjoining properties.
